column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Rayner Unwin]]'''.

column1: *'''Subject:''' The printed appearance of colours of certain pictures in the Ballantine Tolkien Calendar
*'''Publication:''' Excerpts from the letter have been published in [[Amon Hen 70|''Amon Hen'' 70]] (p. 3)
column2: in [[Christopher Tolkien]]'s article "'Moria Gate'...Another Look". A shorter part of the letter (although the entry on the letter includes more descriptive information of the contents) was reprinted in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]'' (p. 767).
